teams.ucmTeam
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  teams.ucmTeam.Message

public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object

A generic message that can be sent by the UCMPlayer robots. A message at least contains the id of the sender, the id of the receiver and the type of message:

  • Unicast: The message is sent only to the receiver
  • Multicast: The message is sent to the whole team
  • Trainer: The message is sent to the trainer
Subclasses will include the message content

Author:
GAIA(UCM)
